description: Incremental improvement aiming to preserve 100% settlement while slightly tightening liquidity usage to reduce costs under zero penalties and no collateral usage.

on_true.description: Always release urgent or EOD-rush payments.
Release when there is enough effective liquidity with buffer.

on_false.description: Hold when liquidity is insufficient and payment is not yet urgent or EOD.
For non-urgent payments, require a slightly higher liquidity buffer to reduce overdraft risk and unnecessary early releases.

payment_tree.description: Release payments that are urgent or near end-of-day regardless of liquidity buffer to guarantee settlement.

bank_tree.description: No explicit bank-level budget or state control in this simple iteration.

strategic_collateral_tree.description: Avoid posting strategic collateral in this configuration to keep collateral costs at zero.

end_of_tick_collateral_tree.description: Do not adjust collateral at end of tick; maintain zero-collateral stance.
